A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Poor execution. ADHD film style turns this into an awkward summer action flick. Fans of Star Wars will be asking \"what happened to the heroes I love?\" and \"why are all the rules of the force being broken/changed and why is there no explaination of what is going on?\"\nThis is as spoiler free of ab explaination as I can give. This movie was majorly disappointing.
